Pre-sale Schedule

7-Phase Progressive Pricing - 12 Month Program

  • Month 1-2: $0.01 per token - 30% discount, founder status
  • Month 3-4: $0.05 per token - 25% discount, priority access
  • Month 5-6: $0.08 per token - 20% discount, exclusive content
  • Month 7-8: $0.12 per token - 15% discount, governance rights
  • Month 9-10: $0.18 per token - 10% discount, early features
  • Month 11-12: $0.25 per token - 5% discount, beta access
  • Final 2 weeks: $0.30 per token - Final chance, launch preparation

Total Presale: 25,000,000 tokens | Launch Price: $0.40

Development Roadmap

Phase 1: Foundation (Q4 2025)

Smart contract development, Genesis NFT completion, community building infrastructure

Phase 2: Genesis Launch (Q1 2026)

Genesis NFT collection launch, pre-sale token program begins, Web3 integration go-live

Phase 3: Community Expansion (Q2 2026)

Main NFT collection development, Contentlynk beta development, community governance implementation

Phase 4: Platform Launch (Q3 2026)

Main collection rollout, Contentlynk public beta, creator onboarding program

Phase 5: Global Expansion (Q4 2026+)

Platform scaling, international expansion, major brand partnerships

Creator Economy Revolution

Contentlynk Platform Benefits

  • Fair Creator Compensation: 60-75% revenue share vs industry standard ~0%
  • Tier-Based Benefits: Enhanced revenue for community members
  • Direct Monetization: Earn $HVNA tokens for quality content
  • NFT Integration: Mint and sell content as NFTs
  • Community Governance: Vote on platform features and policies

Investment Thesis Summary

Why Havana Elephant Brand

This project offers community members a unique opportunity to participate in three major trends simultaneously:

  • Web3 Utility Revolution: Moving beyond speculation to genuine utility-driven ecosystems
  • Creator Economy Transformation: Fair compensation addressing the $104B creator economy
  • Sustainable E-commerce Evolution: Blockchain integration with environmental responsibility

The structured approach provides multiple participation entry points while maintaining exclusivity and utility focus. Early participants gain maximum exposure to all community benefits through immediate utility and transformative potential.

Building a Sustainable Community-Driven Future

Havana Elephant Brand's Web3 integration represents a revolutionary approach to community building and creator empowerment. By emphasizing membership benefits, creator empowerment, and environmental responsibility over speculative returns, we build genuine long-term value for all community participants.

"Together, we're building more than a Web3 project - we're creating a global community that celebrates authenticity, supports creators fairly, and demonstrates that sustainable luxury and technological innovation can work hand in hand to create positive change in the world."
